  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeaterCI, HeaterImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class HeaterOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements HeaterCI
    The class HeaterOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the HeaterCI component interface.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2021-09-13
